item.title: Woman in coma after being attacked by dogs in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[RAICHUR: A 20-year-old woman, Mahadevi, is in coma after being attacked by a pack of stray dogs at Maddipet in Raichur. The incident occurred when the woman was on her way to a temple in the morning.
The dogs attacked the woman, causing her to fall and suffer severe head injuries. The dogs then dragged her on the ground, causing further injuries.
The woman was rushed to the RIMS Hospital in Raichur, where she is currently undergoing treatment. However, her family is struggling to make ends mee...]]>
